description: Patrol mission around the perimeter of the specified New York operations area, with an additional 50 m2 buffer zone, at an altitude of 90 meters.

waypoints.description: Takeoff from the center of operations
Navigate to the eastern boundary of the operations area
Navigate to the northern boundary of the operations area
Navigate to the western boundary of the operations area
Return to the southern boundary of the operations area
Land back at the center of operations

safety_considerations: Avoid flying over densely populated areas
Maintain a safe distance from buildings and structures
Monitor weather conditions for potential hazards
Ensure sufficient battery life for the duration of the mission
success_criteria: Successful navigation of the entire perimeter
All waypoints reached within the estimated duration
original_command: haz un recorrido del perimtro del go json y amplia un marge de 50 m2 de area a una altura de 90 metros
